row.scheme: ;;RefreshDynamicDirectives (let loop ((number 0)) (define tag (d-DirectiveGetNthTag-score number)) (if tag (let ((index (string-index tag #\:)) (command #f) (arg "")) (if index (begin (set! command (substring tag 0 index)) (set! arg (substring tag (+ 1 index)))) (set! command tag)) (set! command (string-append "d-" command)) ; (disp "looking at " tag "and " command "\n") (if (positive? (logand (d-DirectiveGet-score-override tag) DENEMO_OVERRIDE_DYNAMIC)) (let ((sym (string->symbol command))) (if (defined? sym) (eval-string (string-append "(" command " \"" arg "\")"))))) (loop (+ 1 number))))) ;;; FIXME there are 13 other types of directive to refresh ,,,
row._tooltip: Re-runs any directives that may have become stale.
